TopicTitle: [Artwork] Unsinn's gallery of random Kerbal cartoons!

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to get back to drawing after a long period of artistic inactivity, so here's a little sketch I drew of our common, green hero: Jebediah Kerman! I'm currently digitalizing it in PhotoShop and I'm almost but not quite done. What do you think of the sketch, though?

Here's Jeb in a somewhat altered version of the Kerbals' characteristic, orange launch suits!

I'm not very good at shading and lighting, so I'll just blame the different physics of the Kerbal universe!

Edited September 2, 2012 by Felsmak
Sweet ! Love that little helmet protector. Or whatever you call it.

Sweet ! Love that little helmet protector. Or whatever you call it.

Thanks! Yes, it looks adorable on Kerbals. And after some googling, I found out that they're called snoopy caps!
Shading's not bad man... Better than what I could do anyways
Okay, I'm probably just being really picky as always, then.

Vackert!

I like the flag on his arm and the name tag, it's the little things you know. And is that an oxygen gauge? On the arm?

No! Don't revive this ancient relic of a thread. Oh, well. Too late.

Man tackar! That's my Swedish design for a Kerbal flag, heheh. And no, that thing is just a luminous space watch.
